data.text: I checked out earlier than anticipated but had already paid for 4 nights a total of 1153.89 which was outrageous. I came in one day prior than my reservation and Fernando said my extra night would only be 88.00 euro. I agreed to it. I went to my room and there was mold on the ceiling the bathroom was dirty and when I mentioned it to Fernando he said he could refund my money and take my business elsewhere. I checked in at 2am with a family of small children. Where was I going to go and he knew I was in a bind so he was rude. I then the following day spoke to two front desk ladies which assured me that I could leave early without paying a penalty as I paid for flexible rate. My first night was 88 and second night was 270.00 which as is was ridiculous because I saw other people's quotes which were laying on the counter for anyone to see their private credit card information (courtesy of Carlos) at a much lower rate. Then after attempting to check out Carlos was rude but after an hour and 15 minutes of haggling me and trying to charge me for 3 nights which I was only there 2 tells me that my refund is only 400 then he says no 500 then after more arguing he says okay 700 is the best I can do. After further arguing we find my initial charge was incorrect and I had paid 100 euro more than I was supposed to. He then attempted to haggle me down more and say he had included that in the price. All said and done he refunds me 700 back. I leave upset but accept it. Come to receive an email later that night that someone made new reservations at this hotel and charged me again the full rate and cancelled my refund which they gave me hours earlier. No explanation or anything. This is fraudulent and the worst experience I have ever had at a hotel I was not present for the cancelation and recharge of the fees. I did not receive a call nor did I authorize a charge on my card. They fraudulently created new reservations and charged me without my permission or card present.
data.title: DO NOT BOOK!!! TERRIBLE SERVICE!!!!

data.text:
I spent 6 nights at Hotel Travelodge Barcelona during my business trip to attend MWC 2024.
Be it the location, facilities provided and the kindness of helpful staff (Lilia & Victor) made the stay very pleasant.
Highly recommend ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
data.title: Pleasant Business Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear customer,
We know how important it is for all of us to know the experience of users, so we are glad that you had a happy stay and that you want to recommend it to other travellers.
Thank you very much.
owner_response.author: Customer Care Team  Travelodge Hoteles España

data.text: This hotel is very clean and the clerks are so kind. (Especially Liliia was so kind and supportive) I participated in MWC24 and Travelodge Barcelona Fira was the best choice for those who want best business success. The breakfast was gooood.
data.title: Best hotel in Barcelona Fira

user_location.name: Phu Quoc Island, Kien Giang Province

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Customer, 
Thank you very much for your words. 
At Travelodge we aim to offer the best stay to our customers and a great job is done by our team of colleagues, who with their treatment and good work get this kind of comments. We are very happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay and that you enjoyed a great breakfast every morning.
We hope to see you again soon on your next visit to the city.
owner_response.author: Customer Care Team  Travelodge Hoteles España

data.text: Great value and lovely staff.. I left a portable screen in the room. Called them, they said yep have it! I collected on a return trip! It's on the Fira site so easy access to the exhibition centre and very close to the metro... about 25 minutes to the centre.
data.title: Great honest value

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
We would like to thank you for your review of your happy stay at Travelodge. 
It really is our motto to offer the best value for money hotels. 
And of course, our colleagues are happy to help you in any way they can, whether it be providing information or storing any items you may have forgotten in your room.
We hope to see you soon on your next visit to the city. 
Best regards
owner_response.author: Customer Care Team  Travelodge Hoteles España

data.text: Great location, close to Barcelona Fira, FairPlayPadel and Gran Via 2 shopping centre, great staff. Most friendly and helpful receptionist ever (Sigfrid and specially Victor who did he best to help and make my stay amazing).  Again, lovely and great first impression of hotel. Everything about the hotel was exceptional. It was clean, roomy with excellent service.  Great value for money. Room itself was comfortable. I was very pleased with my stay. I hope to be back for another visit in the future.
data.title: Thank you very much victor. Bless you!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear customer,
Thank you very much for the great review. 
We love to receive this kind of reviews, but most of all we love to know that the hotel has exceeded your expectations and that you had a great stay. 
If you are travelling to Madrid, Barcelona or Valencia remember that we have 6 hotels in these cities and we would love to welcome you.
Best regards,
owner_response.author: Customer Care Team  Travelodge Hoteles España
